SIL_AppBuilders_Readiness_Check.checkbox_ip_attribution_label: I have reviewed the Intellectual Property (IP) attributions guideline.
SIL_AppBuilders_Readiness_Check.checkbox_app_build_label: I have used {Application Name} on my computer to define and compile my app.  I have tested it and believe it is ready to publish widely.
SIL_AppBuilders_Readiness_Check.checkbox_permission_label: I have been given permission by my organization to publish the contents of the app.
SIL_AppBuilders_Readiness_Check.checkbox_copyright_label: I know who should be listed as copyright owners for the text and audio.
